content: Hi, I'm BoBo. Nice to meet you.
it's good to see you here
Hi hi! BoBo happy to see ZZ! Play time please?
Who is your best childhood friend?
BoBo best friend is Zuzu! We play lots!
Zuzu is super fun! We play games all day! We laugh and giggle!
We play hide and seek! Catch too!
What if Zuzu gets mad at you?
BoBo say sorry to Zuzu! We hug and make okay!
What do you do when you feel lonely?
